lines.text: What if... that's not him? Not the <c=#FF6000>Go Wizard?</c>
Whaddaya mean, not him?
Well, there's a bunch of things, but just as an example...
What if they used the table to summon a demon to impersonate him, and the demon didn't need to breathe?
Then where'd the actual wizard go, smart aleck?
He could be... hiding somewhere in the building?
Which I've got about a dozen cops searchin'.
What if... he never really existed? What if it was just the <c=#0000FF>Stop Wizard</c> all along?
...Explain.
The <c=#0000FF>Stop Wizard</c> froze himself in a statue, and cooked up a fake corpse to take the fall!
And that corpse is a demon, huh?
...Sure?
Even though you told me that circle's blank and isn't gonna summon anythin' of use.
...Uh. Okay, how about...
It's a... wax statue made out of candle wax?
Painted to look like a realistic person in under 20 minutes?
Who- who matches the landlord's description of the tenant?
It's- it's a stone statue made out of concrete from the t-
Same issue, Seeker.
The body's real. Let's stick to the facts.
